question: 堤
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is like the reading of <ja>包み</ja>, which means "bundle" or "package." Try to think of an <vocabulary>embankment</vocabulary> that's made purely from bundles and packages. These <ja><reading>包み</reading></ja> (<ja>つつみ</ja>) are the only thing holding the water in!
